name: Grandpas Revenge
description:
This is a game where you solve math problems as fast as you can, to reach the end. If you solve the problem in time, you will move forward a step, if not, you wont move at all, if you answer wrong, you will move back.

If you're doing well, the game will decrease the time limit, if not, it will increase it. You can see the time limit next to the problem, and the time you've spent.

When I asked my mom what I should call it, she said "Grandpas Revenge", I have no idea why, but I couldn't come up with anything better.

When I made this, I tried to do it as fast as possible as a sort of challenge to see how fast I could make it.
